name: BladeRyckert: The 30th
description:
A turn-based cyberpunk puzzler by Branden Vennes (Programming/Design), Nickson Phosey (Art/Animation), and Max Lescohier (Music/Sound).

2038: Giantbomb's 30th Anniversary. 

Ten years ago JEFF and VINNY mysteriously disappear, leaving the offices in the hands of BRAD and DAN. Both had contrasting ideologies behind the BRAND, but DAN believed that it was necessary for JEFF and VINNY to be apart of it.

Instructions for playing:

- Click adjacent tiles to move Dan around the board.
- Robots will chase the player if they become alerted.
- Right click anywhere on the board to fire the laser once it has charged.
- The laser becomes charged after moving 5 spaces.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - move Dan to adjacent tile

Right Mouse Button - hack turret to destroy robots

‘R’ Key - reset level

‘ESC’ - quit game

Additional Notes:
* recommend playing at 1080p or higher, otherwise the UI gets cut off

* you can skip the intro and ending movies with the left mouse button
